channel.title: Posts on HardCIDR
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on HardCIDR

item.title: SaladCat: Distributed Password Cracking on the Cheap Using Salad Cloud
item.description: I used Salad Cloud to build a distributed hashcat cracking setup for password cracking.

item.title: VCSP Cloud Security Presentation
item.description: Kyle LePrevost gives a presentation to the Virginia Cyber Security Partnership in 2017 regarding Cloud Security

item.title: Crossing Your Tees: Bug Hunting for Fashion
item.description: I found a bug in a competition Bonobos sponsored and wound up with $500 in free clothes.

item.title: Social Media Analysis of the 2012 Election
item.description: An analysis of the 2012 vice presidential debate from a social media perspective. This was a college project for Clemson's Social Media Listening Center.

item.title: Trading Forex Based On Social Media Indicators
item.description: A brief overview of one of my college projects around trading FOREX using social media indicators. This project wound up getting $250k in VC funding, but fizzled out.
